title: Ezekiel Elliott, Hard Knocks, and Antonio Brown
itunes:title: Ezekiel Elliott, Hard Knocks, and Antonio Brown
description:
Colin discusses why Ezekiel Elliott is bidding against himself, the Oakland Raiders on Hard Knocks, and why he thinks Antonio Brown left a perfect situation. Guests include Nick Wright, Antonio Cromartie, Tyler Dunne, and Reggie Bush. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
